price: 8. Qhuraan nek fanaak Mucammadal ﷺ obsimee? Tonna hinnay usun Yi- Qhuraanak agay waagat yanin nabiyow. Wonna hinnay uxih Yi- digaalá tammoyse weenik-sa woh kah iyyaanam.
arabic: أَءُنزِلَ عَلَيۡهِ ٱلذِّكۡرُ مِنۢ بَيۡنِنَاۚ بَلۡ هُمۡ فِي شَكّٖ مِّن ذِكۡرِيۚ بَل لَّمَّا يَذُوقُواْ عَذَابِ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: a-unzila ʿalayhi al-dhik'ru min bayninā bal hum fī shakkin min dhik'rī bal lammā yadhūqū ʿadhābi
